author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: How to Curl Your Hair With A Wand Flat Iron Crimper - Ways to Curl Hair
text:
Unlike most people, I've never strived for those cascading Disney Princess curls. I like to add waves to my hair with my flat iron or I just let my hair air dry ‚Äì pretty ringlets have never been my thing. (1. They take too long and 2. They're way too girly for me.)
Still, I wondered if there was a whole world of curly-haired goodness that I was missing out on, so I decided to try styling my hair with a different curl/wave-making hot tool every day for an entire week.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Here's what happened:
Before For perspective, here's what my hair looks like with no product:
Smiling for once because the word "editor" is now officially in my job title. You're looking at Seventeen.com's new Assistant Style Editor! üëäüèª 2017's going to kick ass.
A post shared by Kelsey Stiegman (@klstieg) on Dec 23, 2016 at 2:05pm PST
Let's do this.
Day 1: Velvet Curling Wand
